name: DeductibleType
title: Deductible Type
description: Deductible Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: The lowest deductible amount applicable.
Deductible applied to property damage claims on a per-person basis.

designation.value: Deducible de daños a la propiedad por persona

concept.definition: Deductible applied to property damage claims on a per-occurrence basis.

designation.value: Deducible de daños a la propiedad por ocurrencia

concept.definition: Deductible applied to bodily injury claims on a per-claimant basis.

designation.value: Deducible de lesiones corporales por reclamante

concept.definition: Deductible applied to bodily injury claims on a per-occurrence basis.

designation.value: Deducible de lesiones corporales por ocurrencia

concept.definition: Combined bodily injury and property damage deductible applied per claimant.
Combined bodily injury and property damage deductible applied per occurrence.
Deductible for bodily injury and property damage under Coverage A that also applies to supplementary payments.

designation.value: LC/DM-Garantie A-Applicables également aux paiements supplémentaires
LC/DP-Cobertura A-Aplicable también a pagos suplementarios

concept.definition: Property damage deductible under Coverage A applicable to supplementary payments with limits per claimant.

designation.value: Franchise DM Garantie A-Applicables aux paiements supplémentaires/Limite/Demandeur
Deducible DP Cobertura A-Aplicable a pagos suplementarios/Límite/Reclamante

concept.display: Employee Benefits Administration - Deductible per Claim
concept.definition: Deductible for employee benefits administration errors and omissions applied per claim.

designation.value: Franchise - Administration des avantages sociaux - Par réclamation
Deducible de administración de beneficios para empleados por reclamación

concept.definition: Deductible for voluntary medical payments applied on a per-person and per-accident basis.

designation.value: Remboursement volontaire des frais médicaux (par personne/par accident)

concept.definition: Deductible applicable to property damage involving municipal property.

designation.value: Deducible de daños a la propiedad municipal

concept.definition: Property damage deductible under Coverage D for tenant legal liability applied per occurrence.

designation.value: Franchise DM Garantie D-Responsabilité civile des locataires (par sinistre)
Deducible DP Cobertura D-Responsabilidad legal del inquilino (por ocurrencia)

concept.definition: The portion of a claim that the insured agrees to pay.
The amount of loss the insured retains before coverage applies, functioning as self-insurance.
A deductible that decreases or disappears based on specified conditions such as claim-free years.

concept.display: Combined - Minimum Dollar Amount or Percentage
concept.definition: Deductible calculated as the greater of a specified dollar amount or percentage.

designation.value: Combinado - Monto mínimo en dólares o porcentaje

concept.definition: No deductible applies to the claim.
A deductible type not otherwise specified in this code system.
A flat dollar deductible that decreases based on specified conditions.
A percentage-based deductible that decreases based on specified conditions.
A fixed dollar amount deductible expressed in whole dollars.
Deductible expressed as a number of hours, typically used for time-based coverage such as business interruption.
Deductible calculated as a percentage of the claim amount or insured value.
Cumulative deductible applied across all claims during a policy period.
Deductible is waived under specified conditions.
